General.Name: AYER Holdings Bhd
General.Description: AYER Holdings Berhad, together with its subsidiaries, engages in property development and plantation businesses in Malaysia. It develops residential and commercial properties; and cultivates oil palm and durian, as well as provides management services. The company was formerly known as TAHPS Group Berhad and changed its name to AYER Holdings Berhad in December 2017. AYER Holdings Berhad was incorporated in 1907 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
